name: matts-resume
description: My resume in a few formats.

scripts.pdf:en: pandoc -s resumes/markdown/extended-en.md --latex-engine=xelatex -o resumes/pdf/extended-en.pdf && pandoc -s resumes/markdown/short-en.md --latex-engine=xelatex -o resumes/pdf/short-en.pdf
scripts.pdf:pt: pandoc -s resumes/markdown/extended-pt.md --latex-engine=xelatex -o resumes/pdf/extended-pt.pdf && pandoc -s resumes/markdown/short-pt.md --latex-engine=xelatex -o resumes/pdf/short-pt.pdf
scripts.pdf: npm run pdf:en && npm run pdf:pt
scripts.word:en: pandoc -s resumes/markdown/extended-en.md -o resumes/word/extended-en.docx && pandoc -s resumes/markdown/short-en.md -o resumes/word/short-en.docx
scripts.word:pt: pandoc -s resumes/markdown/extended-pt.md -o resumes/word/extended-pt.docx && pandoc -s resumes/markdown/short-pt.md -o resumes/word/short-pt.docx
scripts.word: npm run word:en && npm run word:pt
scripts.latex:en: pandoc -s resumes/markdown/extended-en.md -o resumes/latex/extended-en.tex && pandoc -s resumes/markdown/short-en.md -o resumes/latex/short-en.tex
scripts.latex:pt: pandoc -s resumes/markdown/extended-pt.md -o resumes/latex/extended-pt.tex && pandoc -s resumes/markdown/short-pt.md -o resumes/latex/short-pt.tex
scripts.latex: npm run latex:en && npm run latex:pt
scripts.publish: git add . && git git commit -m 'Deploying generated versions to GitHub' && git push remote origin master
scripts.generate: npm run clean && npm run pdf && npm run word && npm run latex && npm run publish && node lib/log.js

author: Matheus Brasil
